name: Minicart for WooCommerce
author: Ahmad Shyk

sections.description:
The plugin will allow you to add Minicart on your website. You can change position of Minicart from plugin options. There’s 5 built in cart icons for you to select from. Shorcode is now available in free version.

Pro Version

Pro version provides more icons, an option to upload custom cart icon, custom styling.
Go PRO
sections.installation:
1. Minicart for WooCommerce required WooCommerce
  2. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select “Add New”
  3. Search for “woo-minicart”, Install & Activate it
  4. Go to Woo Minicart settings page to choose minicart icon and position.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 Initial Release
1.0.1 Tested with WP 5.0.3 and WC 3.5.4. Fixed some CSS.
1.0.2 Tested with WP 5.2.2 and WC 3.7.0. Fixed some CSS and fix cart icon links.
1.0.3 Replaced depprecated functions.
1.0.4 Fixed incorrect call to functions and removed minicart from cart and checkout pages.
1.0.5 Fixed translation issues
1.0.6 Minor bug fixes + WP 5.8 and WC 5.5.1 compatibility test
2.0.0 Minor bug fixes + Shortcode included in free version.
2.0.3 Bug fix related to translation
2.0.4 Display name updated
2.0.5 Minor Bug fix
